  • what's this?

  • Welcome to trademarkhell.net, the designated dumping ground for my ramblings, thoughts, and rambling thoughts. I mostly just use this site to publish my pseudo-essays on various topics, predominantly relating to my interests.

    I unfortunately haven't yet thought of a pretentious way to describe my site as a internet utopia which will change the world, so the best I can do is a philisophical quote generator, which I'll attach below. Thank me for my boundless wisdom later.

    loading...

    Anyways, click around the site if you want, there's probably cool stuff (if page long essays about useless things are considered cool nowadays)

  • what's new?

        • Site Templates Aren't a Bad Thing // 03 September 2024
          Sites that use templates tend to get a decent bit of criticism, and this is fair because they're boring as hell, but I honestly think templates do a lot more for the indie web than people think. I actually defend something in an article instead of making fun of things for once, shocker. Read it today.
        • The Decline of Computer Literacy // 02 September 2024
          I think a lot of people, including myself, were under the impression that computer literacy would only go up with every generation, but as of late I've been seeing the opposite. In hindsight it's probably really obvious why this is, but I'm sure as hell gonna write about it anyways.
